name: Vectorial Rush
description:
🔶🔷🔶🔷

Welcome to Vectorial Rush!
In this boss fight game, destroy every bosses with your bullets and your dash, good luck!

Controls :

  • Directional arrows to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to dash

A game made in 3 hours for the Trijam #125. The theme was "One enemy only".
Hope you like it!

🔶🔷🔶🔷
